chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The JBoss Developer Studio is an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) that includes JBoss Tools and assists with the development of applications and services on JBoss Middleware software. These tools have been developed and are used by developers for increased efficiency and productivity with JBoss software.

This guide covers the basics of the interface you will be working with and the tools within it, assuming as little knowledge on your side as possible. If you are not familiar with JBoss Developer Studio then this guide is the best place to begin.
